EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - New York
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in New York.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Saturday, July 16th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/newyork]]>
Location Pivotal New York <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/newyork]]> 625 Avenue of the Americas Second Floor New York, NY 10011 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal+Labs/@40.740284,-73.9972717,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c259bccd2dfbab:0xad7f9c23ffc3e702!8m2!3d40.74028!4d-73.995083]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
